reviews_data.review_text: Great food but a mediocre experience. Had the tasting menu. Each course paired with a wine. Unfortunately no explanation was given as to the wine info paired with each course. The menu was also different as advertised on their instagram account. The waiter was a bit of a robot. No interaction and not overly friendly. We wont be going back or recommend.

A real winner, from the beautiful dining room to the friendly staff everything was pretty much perfect.

The menu is big enough to offer lots of choice but not so big as to make you worry and the quality of the food was excellent. The staff are incredibly friendly and efficient and the entire experience was wonderful. I am not in Capetown for long but will make a point of having another meal here before I leave!

On the second of November 2021, I came to this place. The food was good, the waiter gave me a good service. The reason why I gave a 1 star rating is because that white guy at the door gave me a nasty stare and that did not make me feel welcome. I had to ask for a table for one. He did not even direct me there. He almost ruined my night.

Should not have eaten here really really wish we didn’t .Should have heeded first warning sign, upon booking we were told we only have 2 hours to eat (apparently this is normal practice during festive season) even though tables were open! waiter was so moody , food was def not worth the price, tasteless and sad. The whole experience was regretful! and it was my birthday treat!

Went here twice on our trip, the steaks are delicious! The fillet was definitely a highlight. All the sides were very good and fresh.
Service was fantastic always touching base and friendly.
It’s located inside a shopping centre but it’s a very nice place to dine at for any occasion.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Aaron, twice in one trip? Now that’s the highest compliment. We’re so glad everything was delicious, fresh, and enjoyable, and that the friendly, attentive service made both visits feel special. Thanks for choosing us - we’d love to welcome you back again.

reviews_data.review_text:
Visited in December 2024.
South Africa. Capetown.
Seeking a seafood-centric dining experience, we discovered NV80. The restaurant itself is beautifully appointed, a spacious and airy venue with ample seating, decorated in a bright and welcoming palette.

The Food:

The menu is extensive, showcasing a strong focus on both seafood and grilled meats. We opted for a selection of appetizers and individual main courses. The Vietnamese-style oysters were a triumph – plump, fresh, and the perfect start to our meal. Next, the baby calamari were truly exceptional; tender and delicate, their slightly spicy tomato sauce was expertly balanced, resulting in a melt-in-your-mouth experience rarely achieved with this ingredient.

In contrast, the Wagyu burger felt somewhat underwhelming in comparison to the seafood dishes. Ordered medium, it arrived closer to well-done, leaving the patty dry and lacking sufficient sauce and seasoning. The overall flavor profile was rather bland; a few adjustments would significantly elevate this dish. The grilled langoustines, however, were outstanding. Perfectly cooked, they were succulent and tender, and the garlic butter accompaniment was the ideal complement.

Service:

Service was impeccable. As the only diners present, we enjoyed undivided attention; the service was prompt, friendly, and the food arrived swiftly.

In conclusion:

NV80 exceeded our expectations. The ambiance, the high quality of the food, and the attentive service combine to create a truly delightful dining experience. This restaurant is highly recommended for its delicious food and welcoming atmosphere. A perfect combination!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Olga, thank you for your amazing review! We're delighted to have exceeded your expectations in every way. However, we apologise that our Wagyu Burger didn't quite meet your standards. We take your feedback to heart and will share it with our chef to review and act upon accordingly. Thank you for recommending us and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

reviews_data.review_text: I have eaten in several great restaurants throughout the world. I will share more detail about that with you later. On a recent trip to South Africa with a tour group I had the experience of eating in one of the world’s best steakhouse restaurants. NV – 80 Bar and Grill is located in The Point Mall in Sea Point, Cape Town, South Africa. However, this is not what you would call mall dining. NV - 80 is a medium high to high end restaurant serving the fare that one would expect of such an institution. Decor and appointments are high end. Although we were with a tour group and had a prix fixe menu, what was served to us was first quality beginning with the butternut squash soup served en demitasse.   Main course was a choice of Hake with lemon butter sauce or Sirloin of beef, both expertly prepared, or Gnocchi with mushrooms and truffles for the herbivores among us.  There was no complaint from anyone. I did not order and paid little attention to the desserts. Service was superior with wait staff giving us a hand as we departed. Make this a destination. They know how to welcome guests!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Jo, WOW! thank you for sharing your incredible dining experience at NV-80 Bar and Grill! We're thrilled to hear that our restaurant stands out among the best you've encountered worldwide. Your description of our dishes, from the Butternut soup to the expertly prepared main courses, has our chefs beaming with pride. We're glad you felt welcomed and enjoyed superior service. We can't wait to serve you again and exceed your expectations. Make sure to come back and indulge in our desserts next time - they're not to be missed! Thank you for making us a destination and for your heartfelt review.

reviews_data.review_text:
Nun ja. Ich war leider im Vergleich zu anderen Steakhäusern in Kapstadt nicht begeistert gewesen. Begann schon damit, dass der Kellner wenig Interesse zeigte, das Essen bzw. die Karte zu erläutern bzw. auch eine Empfehlung zu geben, Essen und/oder Getränke betreffend. Da fehlte für ein Restaurant dieser gehobenen Kategorie sämtliche Motivation dem Gast gegenüber. Ambiente modern, angenehm, aber teils, aufgrund der Anzahl der Gäste im Restaurant, einfach teils sehr laut (ebenso die Musik), und es roch, vermutlich von der Lüftung herkommend, teils nach Rauch im Restaurant.
Qualität meines Essens, nun ja, Fleisch okay, Chips eher geschmacklich schwach, Salat schmeckte nicht frisch. Der Tisch wurde dann mit meiner benutzten Serviette kurz gereingt zwischendurch  (NO GO!!). Manager ließ sich am Tisch einmal bei der Vorspeise blicken, danach nicht wieder. Einen Vorschlag des Kellners auf ein Dessert, man kann es erraten, wurde gar nicht erst hingewiesen seitens des Personals. Ich bin nun seit 6 Tagen in Kapstadt, habe einige Steakhäuser und Ketten durchprobiert bisher, kann aber sagen: NV-80 Grill&Bar ist preislich intensiv für Südafrika aber qualitativ eher enttäuschend. Freue mich morgen wieder auf den Hussar Grill Mouille Point. Von meiner Seite aus für das NV-80 keine Weiterempfehlung. Ich werde es meiden.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hi Daniel, thank you for your review.  Although our team takes great pride in both the quality of our dishes and the service we provide, we are sorry that we did not exceed your expectations. 
The atmosphere can be lively at peak times, which many guests enjoy, though we understand this may not suit everyone’s preference. Regarding the service and food comments, these will be shared with our chef to review and act upon accordingly, ensuring we continuously refine and enhance  the experience we aim to deliver.
We’re glad you found the ambience modern and pleasant, and we hope that, should you ever choose to return, we’ll have the opportunity to give you the warm, attentive dining experience we’re known for.

reviews_data.review_text:
While the food at this restaurant was enjoyable and well-prepared, the overall experience left much to be desired. Our waiter seemed uninterested, and we had to wait over 20 minutes after finishing our meal just to get their attention for the bill (the resturant was fairly empty at this point and we could see our server standing and talking upfront). This prolonged wait significantly impacted our overall experience.

Additionally, the air conditioning was positioned directly above us, causing our food to cool down quickly. This detracted from the otherwise delicious flavors.

On a positive note, the hostesses at the door were friendly and welcoming. It's unfortunate that the service aspect fell short, as it had a significant impact on our overall impression of the restaurant. A mid-rating is reflective of the mixed experience we had

reviews_data.review_text:
I've been to your establishment a few times but I have to say that I am disgusted by the way we were treated by the GM on Saturday evening.  We were a family of 4 and was seated at a tiny table that was no bigger than 1 square meter. I asked the waiter if it was at all possible to be moved to a bigger booth as there were 2 vacant at the time . He referred us to the GM who told us .... Sorry it is reserved for 6 pax. I asked him why others .. who were only 4 people allowed to be seated in a booth and he told me they were waiting on another person. We arrived at the restaurant at 20h30 . By the time we left at 22h00 those booths were still empty . Infact another family of 3 walked in and were given a booth.
The waiters came to us to apologize for his behavior which tells me this is not new.
How this man got the job in the first place is beyond me . He have no people skills.. he is a slob and have no respect for his customers.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hi Mishkaat. Thank you for the thorough feedback above. We apologies for the slight delay in response, as we were in the process of investigating the above matter with senior management. 

We would like to apologise profusely for the poor service you received upon your most recent visit, especially as a regular at our establishment. As you may know, this is an unusual service to receive; especially from our GM who is usually incredibly friendly and exceptional at taking care of our guests. Usually, our booths are reserved for larger groups, hence why you were not initially moved. We are, however, in agreeance with you and feel that the manager on duty should have eventually moved you after observing that no larger groups would be joining on the night. We take full ownership that the situation could have been managed better by our team. This has been flagged with senior management to address accordingly. 

We kindly request that you email us at marketing@nonamehg.com so we can revert with further feedback on the situation. We do hope you will reconsider your review based on many other wonderful visits, before this unfortunate experience, and continue supporting our establishment as you did before. 

Kind regards,
NV-80 Grill & Bar

reviews_data.review_text:
Quick Takeaways

🍽️ Excellent food — perfectly cooked meat, fish, and sides

👨‍🍳 High service standards — friendly, professional, attentive staff

🏙️ Convenient location — upstairs in a shopping complex near hotels

💰 Fair pricing for portion size and quality

🪑 Seating a little uncomfortable — wooden chairs could use padding

🧽 Over-eager clearing — staff a bit too quick to remove dishes mid-meal

🌃 Safe area — well lit with visible security and police presence

👌 Refined interior design — elegant, dark, and modern atmosphere

Full Review

Had a lovely meal here. From walking in to walking out, the service and standards were spot on.

The restaurant sits on the first floor of a shopping complex, just off the main road. Parking isn’t great, but there is some on-road parking immediately outside, and car parks nearby. If you’re staying in one of the local hotels, it’s an easy and safe walk, with well-lit streets and a strong security presence in the area.

Inside, the interior is high-end and refined, with a dark, elegant design that gives a clear sense of quality and prestige.

The staff were superb — polite, friendly, knowledgeable, and genuinely keen to ensure everything was just right. Their professionalism and attention to detail really stood out.

The food was delicious and beautifully presented. Both the red meats and fish were cooked perfectly, and the side dishes complemented them perfectly. I couldn’t fault a single element of the meal.

From a price perspective, it was fair value for the portion sizes and quality delivered.

The only negatives were minor: the wooden chairs are quite hard, so a bit of padding would go a long way comfort-wise. And while the staff were excellent overall, the constant attempts to clear plates, glasses, and cutlery mid-meal were a bit distracting. It’s better practice to wait until the table is ready or the customer indicates so — having arms reaching across while you’re still eating breaks the flow of an otherwise relaxed dining experience.

That said, this seems to be a common practice across many restaurants in the region, so I won’t let it affect the overall score.

A great restaurant, with quality food, strong service, and a refined atmosphere — definitely worth a visit. 👏

Some friends & I arrived at this venue without any confirmed booking and we were warmly welcomed with a huge smile by Metalia and escorted to our table, thank you for that, much appreciated.

Once seated we were once again greeted with the warmest smile by our waiter Mr-Q.
This gentleman understands the concept of patron interaction and how to make them feel welcome and totally relaxed.

Nothing was to much for him, he knew the menu backwards and was ready to answer all our questions and he also made amasing suggestions, thank you for that.

We placed our orders and were blown away by the presentation and attention to detail,  once our food arrived.

I must just say I had the best Ribeye on the bone ever at this venue. The taste was to die for just as predicted by Mr-Q.

The venue is absolutely beautiful appointed and the  interior is totally on point, well done.

If you are ever in Sea Point and looking for that special restaurant with amasing food, outstanding quality, taste  and service, this is it.

To the management and staff thank you for a great experience, much appreciated.

Kind regards

Ferdie Liebenberg

I asked for the winter special. The waiter says it was not available but he will check. After leaving the winter special is advertised. How did he not know this. Why offer something that they did not wish to give to customers.... he spoke and worked over my meal. He ordered the meat wrong, a thick piece of meat was made medium well and a thin piece well done instead of the other way around and both orders weren't finished... the cocktails did not taste great. A pinacolda tasted more like a coconut drink with a red stain on it.
Overall the experience wasn't great in the service side. Food was okay though the meat was cold and the chips were so hot it burnt your mouth. The sauces were over done as to kill your pallet. The ambience was okay a but too loud but that could be the winter vibe due to the windows being closed. And lastly I'm not sure if the noise was affecting the waiters hearing or if he wasn't south African because communication wasn't great.
Honestly I wouldn't recommend it.
I will give a thanks to the hostess for putting in some effort for our experience towards the end.

We had yesterday a burger and some spareribs. My wife ordered the spareribs and I was absolutely jealous. They were so delicious. My burger was also great, but afterwards I can recommend the spareribs

She also went above and beyond to get the bar attender to make a special drink for me. I also would like to mention my server Padi was legend excellent customer  service great addition to the team!!

reviews_data.review_text: So I discovered this place last year recommended by friend. Was extremely happy wt the food, the atmosphere and most of all the friendly staff. Since my sister is on holiday fm Ireland, Nv80 is always a stop for us since she absolutely loves the seafood and always goes for the platter since fresh seafood is not readily available in Ireland. Our bill is never less than R3k per visit... We've been 3times. My sister is back to visit hence us visiting last night, to say the experience was appalling is probably an understatement. We were well received by yr hostess. Our Waitron took nearly 10 min before he came to table, no introduction. Thulani, I'm assuming is his name as that was the name on the bill, treated us as if we were not even sitting there... Also the store was not full or busy. He preferred being in the kitchen or chatting wt the Barman than seeing to us. We waited I don't even know how long for him to tell us the price btw the single and double seafood platter. Not sure if he thought we looked too low class to afford our meal. We only wanted the price so we could decide if we each would take the single or the double. He saw me looking at him wt my most disgruntled face and then eventually checked the computer by the bar  for the price. We had only order oyaters sparkling water. Eventually we decided to take our business somewhere else as we were clearly not very welcome in your establishment. Suffice to say, we WILL NEVER frequent yr place again. We have never felt more out of place n humiliated as yr Waitron made us feel. Sad that people still judge one another by the clothes they wear!

Could we kindly ask you to email us at marketing@nonamehg.com so that we can discuss the above matter with you directly? As you know from past experiences, this type of service is not up to our usual standards and is not the experience we want you or any of our guests to have.

reviews_data.review_text: Rather disappointing one has restaurants which feel kids will be noisy and presume they will be noisy and judge all kids the same way. Our child is 7 and from a baby has been to numerous restaurants over the years, he sits still and is quiet, not all kids are the same! He is better behaved than some adults which can be noisy and very rowdy. I have been to your restaurant a few years back and decided to try again and bring our family out from overseas , but not too worry we can take our business elsewhere. Maybe one day when you really need the customers you will change your ridiculous house rules. You are just an average steak restaurant, not a Michelin star restaurant!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Marc,  thank you for sharing your feedback. As much as we love children, our dinner service is not equipped for guests under 12 years of age. Many of our current clientele choose to visit our establishment for date nights and special occasions; and therefore prefer having this house rule in place. This is also very common practice within the hospitality industry, not only in Cape Town, but internationally too. While we aren't able to cater for children during our dinner service, we gladly welcome them to our lunch service daily from 12h00 - 17h30; which is more suitable, as well as enjoyable for children of all ages. We truly hope you understand and choose to visit us for lunch sometime soon.

reviews_data.review_text: One of the best steaks in town. Great selection of cuts. Seafood options are also varied. Wide variety of south African wines available. Excellent location right on Regents Road. First stop on every trip to Cape Town.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Giancarlo,  thank you for such a lovely review! We're flattered to be your first stop whenever you visit Cape Town. It’s wonderful to hear that you enjoyed the food and were impressed by our wide selection of wines. It was an absolute pleasure having you, and we can’t wait to welcome you back again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: I had a fantastic dining experience at NV-80 recently! The food was delicious and the atmosphere was great, but what really made the evening stand out was our wonderful waiter, Simba. He was friendly, attentive, and knowledgeable, making excellent recommendations and ensuring that our every need was met. Simba's warm and welcoming service truly made the evening special. Five stars for NV-80 and a big shoutout to Simba for his exceptional service!"
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Noma, we're beaming with pride after reading your fantastic review! We're thrilled that you enjoyed our delicious food and great atmosphere, but we're especially grateful for your praise of Simba's exceptional service. We'll be sure to pass on your kind words and five-star review to Simba and the entire team. Thank you for choosing us, and we look forward to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text:
I went in for dinner on a Friday night. This was by reservation.

The doors opened for the restaurant promptly as the booking was just as they opened.

Inside the atmosphere was very nice, and the dark theme / lighting added to the ambiance.

The service was decent but could be better in my view. When asked to suggest items apart from the stakes, the waitor did struggle a bit.

I selected the lamb rump with a side of risotto. The lamb was prepared perfectly. The risotto was a bit inconsistent in texture.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Ranvir. Thank you for taking the time to review us so thoroughly. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed our setting and ambiance. We are also thrilled to hear you enjoyed our steak. We will be sure to look into the consistency of our risotto with our head chef and team on duty. We sincerely apologise that your risotto wasn't up to our usual standards. We would also like to apologies for service note being up to scratch when you chose to visit us. This will be taken up with senior management to investigate further. We do however hope to see you again soon for another NV-80 experience!

reviews_data.review_text: The SERVICE is absolutely pathetic, while eating the water comes and takes our plates, brings a bill trying to rush us. The food was below par and SPUR or some other steak house would have been a million times nicer. Please don't waste your time and money at this pathetic place.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hi Raheema, thank you for your review. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations.We always want our guests to feel welcome, relaxed, and well taken care of and it is disappointing to hear that this wasn't the case for you. Your feedback about the service and food has been shared with our team to review and act upon accordingly.

A gentle reminder that  we also encourage all guests to please speak to a manager on duty if they have any concerns during their visit. This allows us to address any issues immediately and ensure a satisfying experience. Although this visit wasn't what you hoped for, know that our door is always open, and that we are confident we can redeem ourselves on your next visit.

reviews_data.review_text:
This was an unexpected surprise! An unassuming door on the first floor of the Checkers Centre in Sea Point yielded a culinary delight…  surprisingly warm ambience with high end touches, superb food and service and really fast food from the kitchen - on a busy Friday night.

Great spot - a definite repeat.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Jennifer, we're ecstatic to have surprised you in the best way and exceeded your expectations on all levels. It was an absolute pleasure serving you, and we can't wait to welcome you back!

reviews_data.review_text:
Great steak , high-end vibes ,welcoming and nice  service 👌🏼

Highly recommend it 🌟🌟

Just be aware no kids under 12 Y
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Sarah, tt's really awesome to hear that you enjoyed your dining experience and that your meal was great! We loved that you appreciated the ambience and that our service made you feel right at home. We can't wait to see you again!

reviews_data.review_text:
NV-80 – A Quiet Cape Town Jewel

Tucked above the Sea Point tide,
NV‑80 waits with polished pride.
A mountain view through glass and light,
An ambience that feels just right.

Spaced-out tables, neatly dressed,
A calm retreat, a lunch well-blessed.
Though plenty of space, we still booked ahead—
And service shone in every thread.

Garlic rolls were warm and fine,
The lamb shank? Truly a dish divine.
Steaks were good—though talk did spill,
To legends carved at Brad’s old grill.

Yet NV‑80 held its ground,
In flavours full and settings sound.
Perfect for romance, or friends in cheer,
A date-night spot both close and dear.

From cutlery glint to candle’s gleam,
This place hums like a gentle dream.
An overall winner, through and through—
Cape Town’s charm in every view.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Poetic Reviews, what a beautifully written reflection. You've captured your experience with such poetic grace—we’re truly in awe. We’re delighted that every detail resonated with you and that your time with us was memorable. Thank you for visiting - it was a pleasure to serve you, and it would be our honour to welcome you back again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: We were warmly welcomed at the door. They opened up the doors exactly 6pm like Google stated. We were seated immediately and the waiters were excellent, eager to serve. Our food arrived within 10mins, and the quality of the food was outstanding! i haven’t tried a better steak in cape town yet.  It was our first time at NV 80 and it’ll definitely not be our last visit. Perfect date night.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi there, we are glad to hear you enjoyed our warm welcome. We will be sure to share your feedback with our staff on duty too! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
Just a wonderful meal, a fabulous waiter, wine menu was fantastic
So all round good fun 2024
Returned 2025 and had a wonderful meal al and beautiful wine service was also wonderful
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Janet! thank you for such a beautiful review! It is so meaningful to us that you chose to return, and that all your visits were filled with wonderful meals, amazing wine, and memorable service. We’re beyond grateful for your kind words, and even more so for the joy of having guests like you who make what we do feel so rewarding. We can’t wait to welcome you back again soon. Here’s to making more memories together!

reviews_data.review_text: I was invited to NV-80 for my Bday and was not disappointed. Service was good and professional. The place itself is nice with subdued lights. Food wise, I started with the Sautéed Prawns, even if the portion was a bit small (3 prawns), it was very tasty. The Chenin blanc cream sauce was super nice (even if a little bit to salty to my taste). Then I order the beaf fillet with fries. Very well cooked and tender. The crème brûlée is also a good choice as dessert 😋. Regarding the wine we ordered a bottle Rijks Shiraz (2013) suggested by the owner. I was not disappointed at all. Owner of the place did his best to make sure we had a great evening, and it worked. I recommend this restaurant.
Beautiful atmosphere, one of the tastiest seafood (prawns) I have eaten in Capetown. Their traditional house sauce is the winner. Excellent wait staff. Simply amazing.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow! thank you so much for your review. We are absolutely delighted to hear that you enjoyed our atmosphere and our seafoof dishes, especially our prawns. Our traditional house sause is indeed a favourite and we are glad that you loved it too. We cannot wait to welcome you back and serve you another amazing meal!

reviews_data.review_text: Lovely halaal friendly spot, offering both surf and turf options, visited the outlet with work colleges, would definitely recommend the salmon with mash, it had asian forward taste profile which was quite welcoming. Booking at this restaurant is essential, the place was packed giving good vibes.

review_questions.Parking options: Paid parking lot, Paid parking garage

reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Kim, thank you for your wonderful feedback! We’re delighted to hear that you and your colleagues had a great dining experience with us and that you enjoyed your meals. Excellent tip about booking ahead – we’re always excited to share our vibrant atmosphere with our guests. Looking forward to welcoming you back for another memorable visit!

reviews_data.review_text:
This was my second visit and once again was not disappointed.  Food was excellent and good value
Only issue i had was the food took  way way too long to arrive...our waitress apologized for the delay as she was not sure why it took so long.
Other than that food was really good and i def recommend to anyone who wants great steak and seafood

review_questions.Recommended dishes: Chilli Garlic Prawns, Fillet Steak & Mash with Mushroom Sauce

reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Anwar, Thank you so much for your kind review and for returning to our restaurant for a second time.  Thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our food and found it to be good value. Sorry again for the delay in receiving your food - we know how frustrating that can be. This is not our usual standard and should this happen again, feel free to bring this to the attention of the manager. We will definitely consider expanding our vegetarian options. We hope to see you soon and provide an even better experience.

reviews_data.review_text:
This restaurant came well recommended and my husband and I decided to try it out to end our Cape Town honeymoon on a good note. However, our dinner did not end on a good note. The food was good, however when it was served, the waitress did not provide me with the appropriate cutlery (ie, a knife) in order to shell the prawns properly. After some time, I managed to grab another waiters attention and they passed me a side plate with cutlery. I used the side plate to neatly tuck away the prawn shells as my plate was full. A waiter then walked past briskly and picked the side plate up, saying nothing, and walking away before I could say anything.

I asked for the bill and the waitress slaps the board on the table, with no sweets. It is not an issue, however everyone else received sweets from the giant bowl in the entry way and it made us feel like we were receiving “cold” treatment for some reason.

The bill came to R818. Gratuity is optional, however the waitress argued with me and insisted on her 10% tip. She refused to type anything else onto the card machine. I then had to calculate the 10% for her to add.

Although the food was good, the behaviour of the staff left a bitter taste in our mouths. So overall the experience was terrible for a restaurant of that calibre.

I would not suggest going to this restaurant as you’re made to feel inferior.

I eagerly await the response of the restaurant.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hi Nabila,

Thank you for your feedback. We’re truly sorry to hear about your experience and would appreciate the opportunity to address it directly. Could you kindly email us at marketing@nonamehg.com so we can be in touch with you personally regarding the above?

Kind regards,
NV-80 Grill & Bar

reviews_data.review_text:
I was there yesterday afternoon. Sitting at the bar, waiting for the food for my friends and I.
I saw, with my own eyes, the red head Chef. She had  dropped a prawn, opened up the take out box and put it in. I looked at the waitrons and they told me WHAT I SAW WAS CORRECT.  The Chef laughed and said, "Well done guys, that was brilliant."

I asked the owners son to check the kitchen cameras ........ His reply was " We do not have cameras"
He then told me to stop being so suspicious and never to come back there again.

This was my birthday meal with friends.

NEVER HAVE I EVER, said a bad word about NV-80.....
Till now.

Had the best date night at NV-80 last night with my wife. We were warmly welcomed and the service from Kudzie was outstanding. The food recommendations were well received and we were pleased with all the choices

review_questions.Parking options: Paid parking lot, Free street parking

reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Christopher. Thank you so much for this wonderful review. We are so pleased to hear that you and your wife enjoyed date night with us. We do hope to see you again soon for another round of trinchado, crème brulee, and baked cheesecake!

reviews_data.review_text: The waiter was a trainee. Really bad. No one supervised him.  He gave bad advice re food choices, didn't top up the wine and had no idea. A great restaurant with good food but he spoilt it badly. Paid a fair amount of money but very disappointed by the service. Will never go there again.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi David, we are sorry that the service did not meet your expectations. We're committed to providing exceptional service, and we will remind our team to be more supportive of our trainees while remaining attentive and ensuring that every guest receives prompt and exceptional service. We hope that the good food will encourage you to visit us again, as we are committed to providing exceptional service, which we are known for.

reviews_data.review_text:
This was my first visit to the establishment, and overall, it left a somewhat positive impression. The ambience and aesthetics were excellent, creating a welcoming atmosphere. Service was generally good, though there was a delay of approximately 20 minutes in receiving the bill.

The burger was well-prepared and enjoyable. However, the steak did not meet expectations, as its texture and flavor resembled a lower-quality frying steak. On the other hand, the sides were exceptional and well-executed.

Dessert was a mixed experience—the fondant was well-made and enjoyable, but the ice cream fell short in quality. Despite these inconsistencies, the restaurant shows promise and warrants a future visit for a more comprehensive review.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Xavier, we appreciate your review. Although you loved our dishes, we're sorry that the steak and ice cream didn't quite meet your expectations. We'll refer this to our chef to review and act upon accordingly. It warms our heart to know that the ambience and aesthetics were excellent. We're holding you to that promised return visit and counting the days until we welcome you back.

reviews_data.review_text: Sat at the bar for a drink for the host to keep telling us she will seat us next but sat all other walks ins for the next hour and thirty minutes before us. Needless to say we walked out. We are regulars at the restaurant and sadly it is not the establishment it once was. On another occasion the drink service was so painfully slow that I have received my meal before the drinks arrived. On another occasion they forgot my meal.  So 3 strikes and your out, lost one of your regulars who’d visit at least twice a month. Shocking. Such a pity because the food is so good but the staff ruin your experience so certainly now worth your money or time.

I’ve been dining at NV80 for a few years and this was the most disappointed I’ve been. The prices have been increased quite significantly so you’d think the service levels would rise with it. Instead , my food was forgotten so I received my meal 20min after everyone else. I had to ask twice for extra basting sauce. The cut of meat was not up
To standard. We were also constantly reminded we need to be out by 8:15 for the next dinner sitting despite being a group of 11 with a substantial spend. To be spending over R500pp and get that level of service is not good enough.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hi Ziyaad. We are truly saddened to receive your review. Especially since you have been visiting us for years and not once felt the need to review us positively. Yet, based on one unfortunate experience, you found it necessary to negatively review us on a public platform instead of reaching out to our team directly to address your concerns.

With this being said, we do apologise for the substandard service you received. As much as we try to deliver our best on a daily basis, human error may occur from time to time. We make a continuous effort to acknowledge these mistakes when they do occur and rectify them as swiftly as possible. Next time, we urge you to please speak to a manager on duty, so that they can ensure you leave feeling satisfied. We also highly recommended that big groups join us for our second seating instead, this way you won't feel rushed. Our seating policy is clearly communicated online prior to confirming your reservation. It's also our staffs responsibility to ensure this policy is met, allowing all operations run smoothly on the night. We do, however, apologise if this was not communicated as well as it should've been. 

We have passed on your feedback to our head chef for further investigation, as well as addressed our front-of-house staff, regarding the substandard service you received. 

Taking the above into consideration, we do hope you will reconsider your review based on previous experiences you've had with us. We also hope you will visit us again in the near future and allow us the opportunity to redeem ourselves. If you have any further suggestions, please don't hesitate to email us at marketing@nonamehg.com.

reviews_data.review_text: Had supper at NV80 this Saturday  24/02/18 for the first time. 4 people. The waiter had very bad mannerisms and made us feel very unwelcome. We booked on Tuesday. When we arrived and asked for a table near one of the windows we were told they are full and the only table was right by the kitchen next to the bar. We arrived at 6.30pm , waiter said we have the table until 8.30pm. The waiter was presumably a foreigner judging by his accent. He did not explain any of the specials just asked for our order.  We finished before 8pm and were still chatting when the waiter brought us our bill - without us asking for it - we just ignored it and left it sitting on the table as we only had to be out by 8.30pm . Ten minutes later he came back and rudely asked "is this done?", it was clear he wanted us out. Upon settling the bill he did not even say "Thank you" or "Enjoy the evening further". This was definitely an unpleasant experience and we will not be returning. The food was average as well for the price.

Not kid-friendly. Called today to make a 2pm reservation for my husband and 3 kids. The reception told us that kids are not allowed in the restaurant after lunch. asked why and they said its just a house rule and couldn't give us an exact reason. A valid reason and i wouldn't have thought of giving a bad review. We cancelled and went to another higher end restaurant where kids are welcomed

21/02/23 Edited after response from owners: please give your response below to your reception staff so they can read this when potential patrons ask. Like I said before if she could have provided a valid reason I wouldn't have posted a review. But the fact that she told us "is just a house rule" showed us that she had no idea how to handle customers. I Expected better service from NV-80
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Kashiefah. We do apologise that you are unsatisfied with our rules around childern. Many establishments, such as our own, allow children under 12 to join us for lunch time. This allows for a more family orientated and relaxed atmosphere to be enjoyed during the day. Dinner service however follows a more formal approach which isn't suitable for young children. Many guests choose to visit NV-80 based on this setup. We have however ensured we accommodate for both a relaxed atmosphere (with kids) and a more formal atmosphere (without kids) at different times of the day. We do hope you understand our reasoning and choose to visit us during lunch with the family or perhaps even date night one evening.

reviews_data.review_text: I went to this restaurant for Valentines day and it was amazing. Their food was super yummy- its not often that a restaurant excels in cooking all proteins but this one does. Everything from the scallops to the flame grilled beef fillet, prawns, trinchado and chocolate fondant was so delicious. I would definitely go back.

The interior of the restaurant is well put together. However, when the restaurant is packed, it feels like a large percent of the oxygen is depleted in the room as well as it becomes too noisy which makes it difficult to focus on the conversation happening at the table and this doesn’t feel good.

The staff are friendly and the service provided is efficient.

The meals, my goodness, they look mouth watering, and the taste, the taste makes the mouth water for more.

NV-80 is renowned for their steaks and they do not disappoint.

The desserts are mediocre. The chocolate fondant that I had, was so dry, that the one scoop of ice-cream wasn’t sufficient to moisten it.

The restaurant isn’t halal. However, things like Armagnac ice-cream contains alcohol in the ice-cream, and therefore a request needs to be made for an alternative which is available at the restaurant.

There is a dedicated smokers section on the balcony, as a non-smoker I’ve appreciated this space. The fresh air and the hum of the city, it was most welcomed.

The price range is average - expensive.

Had a surprise 40th birthday dinner for a friend, here. The food was spectacular! Our waitrons, Best and Pardon made sure our glasses were always full, and we felt pampered and taken care of. Would recommend it to anyone looking for an in-the-wall type venue. I.e. not noticeable from the outside, but sizeable and posh on the inside.

review_questions.Recommended dishes: Dark and Blond Valrhona Chocolate Mousse with Mint Anglaise, Crème Brulee, Chilli Garlic Prawns, Garlic Roll, Calamari Tubes, Fillet Steak & Mash with Mushroom Sauce

reviews_data.review_text: Definitely one of the best steak houses in Town. Exceptional steaks. Service wasn't the best however. It gets extremely busy every evening so reservation is a must.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Rick, thank you for sharing your experience! We’re sorry the service didn’t meet your expectations but thrilled to hear you loved our steaks. We totally agree, to avoid disappointment, we always recommend making a reservation. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

reviews_data.review_text: The place looks good but unfortunately The service at this place has gone to the dogs. Previous owners did a much better job and that clearly shows in how empty this place was on first Thursday. Sad to see for what was once such a quality place. Fillet was also far from what I remember. Dry and hard to swallow. I’d highly recommend Zest instead.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Jacques. You should be contacted telephonically by our team. If you haven't yet, could you please email us at marketing@nonamehg.com and further explain why you felt our restaurant lacked in quality based on one quiet evening and a substandard steak - that could easily have been rectified if you raised your concerns with the manager on duty on the night. Reviews like this can be extremely damaging to any establishment and challenging for us to address if inaccurate or irrelevant context is given.

reviews_data.review_text:
You really wouldn't know this place was here, a disguised tatty door top of the escalator in a shopping mall. Truly you will be amazed at the ambience and buzz they have created once you step across the threshold. This is a superb restaurant. The service is always fantastic, with a smile, with a laugh, with proper customer care. The food is delightful. The chef knows what he is doing and runs a very good kitchen. Honestly you will find it hard to get a better steak. And there are loads of people who will say, "but it's in a mall", but you need to go here. It is awesome. I keep coming back.

Update Jan 2025 and just had a 350g fillet medium rare. Was absolutely stunning. This place continues to excel. And the service is just divine. What a smashing place.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hi Steve, we are so humbled by your review! It's wonderful to know that our establishment has become a special destination for you, and that you've been consistently delighted by our food, service, and atmosphere.

Your kind words about our team's hospitality and our chef's expertise mean the world to us. We're thrilled that our steaks have impressed you, and that you think we're a hidden gem worth discovering.
Thank you for your loyalty and for sharing your enthusiasm with others. We're honoured to have guests like you and we are already looking forward to your next visit.

reviews_data.review_text: The NV80 is quite hidden in a mall. From the outside, you wouldn't believe how big and beautiful it is. The entrance is just an inconspicuous door next to the escalator. Inside it's great. Nice atmosphere and delicious food. The seafood is great. We had our Christmas dinner there.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Johannes. Thank you for taking time to review us. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your experience with us and hope to welcome you back again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
I heard good things about NV-80, so I tried it once. Starters were good, but the steak which I ordered medium rare came blue. I avoided this place for a few months thereafter, until I thought maybe I just had bad luck.

I tried it again and had the exact same experience. For a grill to be this consistent in undercooking steaks, which should be the speciality, something must be wrong. Do you only take certain customers seriously?

The steaks I received had nothing but a sear. Dark red straight through, edge to edge.

Arrived on time and told to wait while they cleaned the table.
Starters was calamari and it was super amazing .
Mains was 500g Rib eye.
I cannot explain to you the taste and how it melted in my mouth.
I can see why they say you must book . The place was packed full but the food came out on time.
Thank you to the waiter and management I will return with friends.

We enjoyed the delicious 'cut of the day'. Both the meat and the side dishes were fantastic. Also the carpaccio was to die for! Our waiter was very friendly.
The chairs were not that comfortable. Furthermore, the only regret is that they eat in 2 groups, so you can't sit that long. You do can finish your drink on the terrace in some comfortable chair.
All in all we had a great evening!
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hi Stefanie, we are delighted to hear that you loved your meals and appreciated the friendly service. Sorry to hear that the chairs weren't as comfortable as you'd have liked. We'll take your feedback into consideration for future improvements. Regarding our seating policy, we understand it may not be ideal for everyone. However, we're glad you were able to relax on our terrace and finish your drink in comfort.
Thanks again for your review, and we're delighted that you had a great evening with us! We look forward to welcoming you back soon.
